entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h late this morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
